column2:
"Perfect...
Defeating 70 enemies seemed to be a
piece of cake to you."

"Especially using that strategy of yours.
It reminds me of how I hate myself for
the lack of training that I have."

"However, thanks to you that I am not
fired and can continue to be an
member of the ARKS."

"Ok, let me control my emotions and
prepare for the next training! Thank
you so much for helping me again!"

"完璧だぜ……
７０体って無茶でも何でもねーんだな。"

"そういうやり方があったとは。
オレどんだけ修行が足りてなかったか
嫌というほど思い知らされたぜ。"

"なにしろオレ、おたくのおかげで
クビにならずに済みそうな気がする。"

"よーし、心を入れ替えて
修行しまくってやるぜ！
いつもいつもありがとうな！"
